Market saturation in the boutique fitness industry
controversies: Class action lawsuit regarding business and financial disclosures

CEO accused of threatening a franchise owner
social_issues: Ethical concerns over franchisee relations and sales practices
governance_issues: Corporate governance concerns due to the class action lawsuit
Leadership behavior and corporate culture issues
